item.title: The Artist - Nana Li
item.author: Eleanor Vincent,
item.description: Nana Li is a freelance illustrator currently based in London. Having previously completed a Biomedical Engineering degree, she now specialises in illustration, comics and character design. She has had several publications and a number of notable clients including Canon, ImgaineFX and SelfMadeHero. …

item.title: The Games Designer - Hugh Osborn
item.author: Eleanor Vincent,
item.description: Eleanor - Can you tell us a little bit about the game you’re making at the moment? Hugh - Exeunt is my first project out of uni. It’s a fast-paced arcade style game with a dark, dystrophic twist. The player controls a character running through an oppressive landscape. By changing into different …
